name: shouldered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of people or clothes) having shoulders of the type described: to be broad/narrow-shouldered Silk trousers were worn with printed blouses or narrow-shouldered jackets. See
shoulder
More examplesFewer examplesHe was a handsome, broad-shouldered man of 42 with a gray-flecked beard.He is too slope-shouldered to look like a natural athlete.He was a big man, wide-shouldered and tall, with a frame that had much muscle in it.
